body:
fucking love this man. he's an old dude now(like 60?), he still making awesome good quality animes, and i still feel his passion on recent works.

i'm thinking to buy all of his book as much as possible... BECAUSE I REALLY REALLY LOVE THIS MAN!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

i also think he ages really fast... i really concern about his health... because i wanna see his good shit till my grand grand grand grand son dies you know i'm saying bro?
I can't believe it's the same guy who works on some of my childhood anime.... no wonder it looks familiar
Always been in love with his style Legend

this is Yasuomi Umetsu works right ?

@shitman, the drawing/animation of his works his works in Mezzo Forte, Kite, Yellow Star are top notch.
Man, I wish he would make a new high quality hentai.
